name: orla sideways shawl
notes:
worked:
* sideways
* flat
* no increasing or decreasing
* beginner crochet pattern

finished size
width - 18 inches - approx
length - 70 inches - approx

yarn
cascade 220 worsted - 880yds.

hook
size 5.5mm / us i/9

type of instructions
this pattern has simple, easy to follow written instructions and does not include any charts. the pattern is written using american standard crochet terms.

languages
english only

terms of use
for personal use only. do not copy, share or sell the pattern in part or whole.
you may sell the finished item made using this pattern.

refund policy
all digital sales are final.

pattern support & questions

email: hellotrulycrochet [!at] gmail.com

about
truly crochet is my blog where i share my latest free crochet shawl patterns. this version on etsy is an ad-free version of my free pattern.
